Argument.Name: workspace
Argument.Description: Workspace within the factory to disconnect from the repository

BoolOption.Name: f
BoolOption.Description: Determines whether all repository workspaces within the factory will be disconnected from the repository. This option takes precedence over the 'workspace' argument.

BoolOption.Name: d
BoolOption.Description: Determines whether the respective workspaces within the factory will be deleted.
